Class booking.model.Hotel

java.lang.Object
booking.model.Hotel
public class booking.model.Hotel extends Object
The booking.model.Hotel class represents a hotel containing a collection of rooms. It provides methods to add rooms, retrieve all rooms, get available rooms, and display hotel information.
